document_data.name: Bassorah
document_data.mainbody: '''Bassorah''' was an inhabitant of [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Personality: Bassorah was a shrew of a woman.
document_data.Activities: Driven by a desire to be accepted by the elite society of Huzuz, Bassorah spent all of her husband's hard-earned money hosting lavish parties that they could not afford. Her actions drove he husband to abandon her one night after such a party.
document_data.Relationships: Bassorah was married to a physician named [[Mustapha]], though she had not seen him in years since he abandoned her with their debts.
